amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the total amount appropriated by 1% excluding military personnel and the Defense Health Program account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 46 printed in House Report 114-623 to reduce the total amount appropriated by 1% excluding military personnel and the Defense Health Program account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Polis amendment (A043) Failed by recorded vote: 69 - 351 (Roll no. 331).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Polis amendment (A043) Failed by recorded vote: 69 - 351 (Roll no. 331).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A043) offered by Mr. Polis.
